properties.label: Loyalty Record ID
properties.name: uat_loyalty_record_id
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

input.sql:
select
     ACCOUNT_ID AS AccountId
     , CLAIM_STATUS_DATE AS ActivityDate
     , null AS ID
     , JOURNAL_TYPE_ID AS JournalTypeId
     , JOURNAL_SUB_TYPE_ID AS 
     JournalSubTypeId
     , MDM_PARTY_ID AS MDM_Account_ID__c
     , MEMBER_ID AS MemberId
     , null AS ProductId
     , null AS Offering_ID__c
     , ACCOUNT_TYPE AS SFDC_Account_Type__c
     , CLAIM_ID AS RHSC_Source_Id__c
     ,SOURCE_SYSTEM AS Source_System__c
     , null AS UsageType
     , '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["user_name"]}')}' AS USER_NAME__C
     ,'Pending'  AS Status
     , '#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"declare_variable_3","path":["uat_loyalty_record_id"]}')}' AS RecordTypeId
     , null AS Aligned_Distributor__c
     , null AS Associate_Opportunites__c
     , null AS ExternalTransactionNumber
     , null AS Financial_Partner_ID__c
     , null AS Forecast_Category__c
     , null AS Industry
     , null AS Product_Split_Offering_Group__c
     , null AS Quantity
     , null AS Renewal__c
     , null AS TransactionAmount
     , null AS TransactionLocation
     from PARTNERPROGRAMS_DB.MARTS.CLAIMS_STAGE_TJ
where transaction_journal_id is null

extended_input_schema.hint:
Set an upper limit for this wait action. If one or more of the async
jobs take longer than this, proceed to the next step without waiting.
Maximum is 120 minutes.
extended_input_schema.label: Timeout limit (minutes)

properties.label: Wait for Salesforce to process all CSV rows?
properties.hint: When Yes, action will return once Salesforce processes all the rows in the CSV file. When No, action will return once the CSV file is uploaded to Salesforce.
properties.name: wait_to_complete

properties.label: CSV chunk size for each Salesforce bulk job (in MB)
properties.hint:
If the CSV file is greater than the chunk size, this action will automatically create multiple Salesforce bulk jobs.
Defaults to 100MB.
properties.name: csv_chunk_size

input.subject: Workato E2Open Activity Transaction Journal Job Status| Job Id:  #{_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}')}
input.body:
="ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_url"]}') || '') + "
" + "Name: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_name"]}') || '') + "
" + "Path: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_path"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_url"]}') || '') + "

" + "Results:
" + "Total Records: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"declare_list_15","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"TotalRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Success: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"declare_list_15","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"SuccessRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Fail: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"declare_list_15","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"FailedRecords"]}') || '') + "

" + "Errors:
" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + ( (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"declare_list_14","path":["list_items"]}') || []) .format_map( "" + "" + "" + "" + "" ) ).join("") + "
Source IDRelated DetailError Message
%{LogList_source_ID}" + "Account ID: %{LogList_AccountID}
" + "Member ID: %{LogList_MemberID}
" + "MDM Party ID: %{LogList_MDMPartyID}
" + "		%{LogList_Message}
"
